name: FIFA International Soccer
overview: It's all here - diving headers, bicycle kicks, dramatic saves in front of the net. The most realistic and complete version of the world's most popular sport is now available for your Game Boy. A fun, action-packed game where you control the action - on and off the field. You've got to think fast to get that goal! Choose from Exhibition, Tournament, Playoff and League modes and play soccer the way you like it.
